instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2915 shows apple logo and progress bar but then white screen
threads.message:
When I boot with ALT I see the boot picker, I can select other external drives but when it gets to a point something should show on the screen, all I get is white. In the case of ASD which has a blue background, all I get is blue. Don't want to start blaming the GPU right away but in this case I also have no idea where I should begin to look.

Before the white or blue screen there is no weird pixelation or any indication the GPU is having an issue. Visual inspection showed a perfect board. On a bare system same issue.

threads.title: 820-2915 shows apple logo and progress bar but then white screen
threads.message: Dead GPU. Heat it up a little bit as a diag method and watch it boot.

threads.title: 820-2915 shows apple logo and progress bar but then white screen
threads.message: What's the best temperature to do so and for how long?

threads.title: 820-2915 shows apple logo and progress bar but then white screen
threads.message: Try 165 C for 2 min 30 sec FOR A DIAG METHOD ONLY!!! This is not a solution. 165 is cool enough that it will not harm the chip if in fact the issue is something else but I will bet money it's the gpu

threads.title: 820-2915 shows apple logo and progress bar but then white screen
threads.message: Alright, will give that a try in the morning. Thanks for the help so far!

threads.title: 820-2915 shows apple logo and progress bar but then white screen
threads.message: Yup, heated the GPU and issue was "resolved". What are the chances of finding a good GPU for this model 6-7 years later, worth having it repaired? (I don't have the equipment needed to replace such large components).

threads.title: 820-2915 shows apple logo and progress bar but then white screen
threads.message: If you are in the EU I can help you, send DM. If you're not then dump it on Ebay, lots of idiots paying good money even for dead ones.
